pe8:255.5: Taṇhāya sabbesampi so kilesānaṃ vāyamati paṭisotaṃ.
pe8:255.6: Yo attanā ṭhito kāyenapi so ṭhito vācācittenapi so ṭhito.
pe8:256.3: Ye anusotagāminiyā paṭipadāya nābhiramissanti, te paṭisotaṃ vāyamissantīti yāva kadāci bhūmiyaṃ, ayaṃ adhippāyo. (6)
pe8:257.1: Āvaṭṭoti idha sutte cattāri suttāni desitāni. (7)
pe8:258.2: Yo kāme paṭisevati pāpañca kammaṃ karoti.
pe8:258.3: So anusotagāmīti na ekaṃsena sotāpannopi kāme paṭisevati.
pe8:258.5: Kiñcāpi sekkhopi kareyya pāpaṃ yathā sutte niddiṭṭho na ca so anusotagāmī, idaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṃ.
pe8:258.6: Na ca kāme paṭisevati na ca pāpakammaṃ karoti paṭisotagāmī na ca ekaṃsena sabbe bāhirako kāmesu vītarāgo na ca kāme paṭisevati, tena ca pāpakammaṃ karoti anusotagāmī paṭisotagāmī, ayaṃ vibhatti. (8)
pe8:261.3: Ye pana sekkhā puggalā, te nibbānapaññattiyā paññattā.
pe8:261.4: Ye pana anāgāmī, te asaṃhāriya paññattiyā paññattā, ayaṃ paññatti. (11)
pe8:262.2: Ye tassa dhammā, te dukkhassa samudayo.
pe8:262.3: Yaṃ rūpaṃ, ayaṃ rūpakkhandho, evaṃ pañcapi khandhā paṭiccasamuppādo, te kilesā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammāyatanaṃ dhammadhātu indriyesu ca paññattā. (12)
pe8:263.1: Sodhanoti yenārambhena idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ, so ārambho sabbo suddho. (13)
pe8:264.1: Adhiṭṭhānoti paṭisotagāminā sabbe sotāpannā ekattena vā niddiṭṭhā rāgānusayapaṭisotagāmino sekkhāva maggo ca sekkho ca puggalo ṭhitattoti.
pe8:265.2: Pāraṅgatoti sabbe arahanto sabbe paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhā ca ekattāya paññattā. (14)
pe8:266.2: Paṭisotagāmino dve hetū dve paccayā ca yāva sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāyadiṭṭhi, tassa paṭiladdhamaggo hetu ārambho paccayo kāyiko cetasikassa koṭṭhāso ca. (15)
pe8:267.1: Samāropanoti vibhatti idaṃ suttaṃ natthi samāropanāya bhūmi. (16)
pe8:268.1: Pañcānisaṃsā sotānugatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yāva diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhānaṃ suttaṃ vitthārena kātabbaṃ.
pe8:268.2: Yuñjato ghaṭentassa vāyamato gilāno maraṇakāle devabhūto paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.4: Na ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya tassa cittaṃ tasitaṃ hoti, na ca anibbiddhattaṃ, idaṃ ca suttaṃ pañcannaṃ puggalānaṃ desitaṃ, saddhānusārino mudindriyassa tikkhindriyassa ca dhammānusārino tikkhindriyassa mudindriyassa ca.
pe8:268.5: Yo pana mohacarito puggalo na sakkoti yuñjituṃ ghaṭituṃ vāyamituṃ yathābhūtaṃ yathāsamādhikā vimutti taṃ khaṇaṃ taṃ layaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ phalaṃ dasseti.
pe8:268.6: Sādhu parihāyati paro taṃ duyhati, no tu sukhaavipākinī bhavati.
pe8:268.8: Tattha yo puggalo dhammānusārī tassa yadi sotānugatā dhammā honti so yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.9: Yo dhammānusārī mudindriyo, so gilāno pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.10: Yo saddhānusārī tikkhindriyo, so maraṇakālasamaye pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.12: Yadā devabhūto na pāpuṇāti, na so teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.13: Yo sotānugatesu yuñjati ghaṭeti vāyamati, so pubbāpannena visesaṃ sañjānāti, sañjānanto pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.14: Sace pana gilānassa manasikāro hoti, tattha yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.15: Sace panassa maraṇakāle saṃviggo hoti, tattha yuñjanto pāpuṇāti.
pe8:268.16: Sace pana na katthaci saṃvego hoti, tassa devabhūtassa sukhino dhammabhūtā pādā evaṃ avilapati.
pe8:268.17: So evaṃ jānāti “ayaṃ so dhammavinayo yattha mayaṃ pubbe manussabhūtā brahmacariyaṃ carimhā”ti.
pe8:268.19: Dibbesu vā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ajjhosito hoti pamādavihārī, so tena kusalamūlena paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇāti.
pe8:269.1: Yā paratoghosena vacasā suparicitā, ayaṃ sutamayī paññā.
pe8:269.2: Ye pana dhammā honti manasā anupekkhitā, ayaṃ cintāmayī paññā.
pe8:269.3: Yaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā, ayaṃ bhāvanāmayī paññā.
pe8:269.4: Yaṃ sotānugatā vacasā paricitā honti, so ca diṭṭheyeva dhamme parinibbāyī, ayaṃ arahaṃ puggalo.
pe8:269.5: Yo upapajjati devabhūto pāpuṇāti, tattha ca parinibbāyati, ayaṃ anāgāmī.
pe8:269.6: Yo tena kusalamūlena paccekabodhiṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ pubbayogasambhārasambhūto puggalo.
pe8:270.1: Sotānugatā dhammāti paṭhamaṃ vimuttāyatanaṃ, vacasā paricitāti dutiyaṃ tatiyañca vimuttāyatanaṃ, manasā anupekkhitāti catutthaṃ vimuttāyatanaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti pañcamaṃ vimuttāyatanaṃ.
pe8:271.1: Sotānugatāya vimuttiyā vacasā yā vācā suppaṭividdhā anupubbadhammassa sotena sutvā sīlakkhandhe paripūreti, manasā anupekkhitā samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūreti, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā paññākkhandhaṃ paripūreti.
pe8:272.1: Sotānugatā dhammā bahussutā hontīti vitthārena kātabbaṃ.
pe8:272.2: Idaṃ paṭhamaṃ saddhāpadānaṃ manasā anupekkhitāti paṭisallānabahulo viharati, vitthārena kātabbaṃ.
pe8:272.3: Idaṃ dutiyaṃ saddhāpadānaṃ diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti anāsavā cetovimuttiyā nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti.
pe8:273.3: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti tathāgataṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ satthā dasseti.
pe8:275.2: Imamhi sutte tayo esanā desitā sotānugatehi dhammehi vacasā paricitehi kāmesanāya samathamaggo.
pe8:276.1: Vicayoti yathā suttaṃ manasikaronto vicinanto sutamayipaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
pe8:276.2: Yathā ca so manasikarotīti yathā sutadhammā tadā cintāmayipaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
pe8:276.3: Yathā diṭṭheva dhamme manasikaroti tadā bhāvanāmayipaññaṃ paṭilabhati.
pe8:278.4: Diṭṭhiyā anupekkhitāti paññāyapi anupekkhitā diṭṭhiyāpi anupekkhitā.
pe8:279.1: Catubyūhoti imamhi sutte bhagavato ko adhippāyo?
pe8:279.2: Ye imāhi dvīhi paññāhi samannāgatā tehi ….
pe8:280.1: Sa nibbutoti maggaphalaṃ anupādisesañca nibbānadhātuṃ manteti, dānena oḷārikānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ manteti.
pe8:280.2: Sīlena majjhimānaṃ, paññāya sukhumakilesānaṃ manteti, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti katā ca bhūmi.
pe8:282.1: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti maggo vutto.
pe8:283.1: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamatoti tīhi padehi lokikaṃ kusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ.
pe8:283.2: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lokuttaraṃ kusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ.
pe8:284.1: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti puthujjanabhūmiṃ manteti.
pe8:284.2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmiṃ manteti.
pe8:285.1: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti magganiyā paṭipadā vuttā.
pe8:286.1: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ maggakathaṃ lokikānaṃ dhammānaṃ desanamāha.
pe8:286.2: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnavānupassanā.
pe8:286.3: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti sāmukkaṃsikāya dhammadesanāyapi paṭividdhā.
pe8:287.1: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti pāṇānaṃ abhayadānena pāṇātipātā veramaṇisattānaṃ abhayaṃ deti.
pe8:287.3: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīle patiṭṭhāya cittaṃ saṃyameti, tassa saṃyamato pāripūriṃ gacchati.
pe8:288.3: Dve sugatiyo devā ca manussā ca, dibbā ca pañcakāmaguṇā, mānussakā ca.
pe8:288.5: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati, kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti maggo vutto.
pe8:288.6: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo desitā sopādisesā ca anupādisesā ca.
pe8:289.1: Vicayoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti iminā paṭhamena padena dānamayikapuññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
pe8:289.3: Dutiyena padena … yanti, niyyānikaṃ sāsananti, ayaṃ adhippāyo. (2–6)
pe8:290.1: Assavanena ca amanasikārena ca appaṭivedhena ca sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā vuttā.
pe8:290.2: Savanena ca manasikārena ca paṭivedhena ca sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā vuttā.
pe8:291.3: Parivattanāti ye pañcānisaṃsā, te pañcādinā paṭipakkhena teneva diṭṭheva dhamme pāpuṇāti, taṃ upapajjamānā aparo pariyāyo. (8)
pe8:292.1: Vevacananti sotānugatā dhammāti yaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhampi paññindriyaṃ viññattampi diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhampi vibhāvitampi. (9)
pe8:293.2: Manasikāro pāmojjapaññattiyā paññatto, diṭṭhadhammāpi ānisaṃsapaññattiyā paññattā. (11)
pe8:294.1: Otaraṇoti tisso paññā vacasā paricitesu sutamayī paññā manasā anupekkhitesu cintāmayī paññā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāsu bhāvanāmayī paññā.
pe8:294.2: Imāni ariyasaccāni indriyāni vijjuppādā avijjānirodho paṭiccasamuppādo indriyesu tīṇi indriyāni, āyatanesu dhammāyatanapariyāpannā dhātūsu dhammadhātupariyāpannāti. (12)
pe8:295.1: Sodhanoti yo ārambho suttassa paveso niyutto. (13)
pe8:296.1: Adhiṭṭhānoti pañcānisaṃsāti vemattatāya paññattā ānisaṃsā sotā anugatāti vemattatāya ariyavohāro paññatto, dhamme ca savananti ekattatāya paññattaṃ. (14)
pe8:297.1: Parikkhāroti dhammassavanassa payirupāsanā paccayo, saddhā hetu.
pe8:297.2: Manasā anupekkhitāti atthappaṭisaṃveditā paccayo, dhammappaṭisaṃveditā hetu, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti saddhammassavanañca manasikāro ca paccayo, sutamayī cintāmayī paññā hetu. (15)
pe8:298.1: Samāropanoti vibhattaṃ suttaṃ aparo pariyāyo nibbatti bale natthi.
pe8:299.4: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīlamayikapuññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
pe8:299.5: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca pahānamāha.
pe8:299.6: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lobhassa ca mohassa ca byāpādassa ca chandarāgavinayamāhāti.
pe8:299.7: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti gāthā alobho kusalamūlaṃ bhavati.
pe8:299.8: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti adoso kusalamūlaṃ bhavati.
pe8:299.9: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti averā asapattā abyāpādatāya sadā.
pe8:299.10: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ñāṇuppādā aññāṇanirodho.
pe8:299.11: Catutthapadena rāgadosamohakkhayena rāgavirāgā cetovimuttimohakkhayena avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti, ayaṃ vicayo. (1–2)
pe8:300.1: Yuttīti dāne ṭhito ubhayaṃ hi paripūreti.
pe8:301.1: Padaṭṭhānanti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
pe8:301.2: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti paññādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti saccādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
pe8:302.2: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati.
pe8:302.3: Dadatopi veraṃ na kariyāti kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto rūpakkhayāpi vedanakkhayāpi, yena rūpena diṭṭhaṃ, tena tathāgato paññapento paññapeyya rūpassa khayā virāganirodhāti evaṃ pañcakkhandhā. (5)
pe8:303.3: Te dānaṃ dassanti parissayapahānāya, ye averābhichandakā, te pañca verāni pajahissanti, ye kusalābhichandakā, te aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessanti aṭṭhannaṃ micchattānaṃ pahānāya.
pe8:303.4: Ye nibbāyitukāmā, te rāgadosamohaṃ pajahissantīti ayaṃ bhagavato adhippāyo. (6)
pe8:304.1: Āvaṭṭoti yañca adadato macchariyaṃ yañca asaṃyamato veraṃ yañca akusalassa pāpassa appahānaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhaniddeso na samudayo.
pe8:304.2: Alobhena ca adosena ca amohena ca kusalena imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni.
pe8:304.3: Tesaṃ paccayo aṭṭha sammattāni, ayaṃ maggo.
pe8:305.1: Vibhattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti na ekaṃsena yo rājadaṇḍabhayena deti, yo ca akappiyassa paribhogena sīlavantesu deti, na tassa puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti so cetaṃ dānaṃ akusalena deti, daṇḍadānaṃ satthadānaṃ apuññamayaṃ pavaḍḍhati, na puññaṃ.
pe8:305.2: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti na ekaṃsena kiṃkāraṇaṃ yañca yo padaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ passati yadi mama rājāno gahetvā hatthaṃ vā chindeyya …pe…
pe8:305.3: na tena saṃyamena veraṃ na karoti.
pe8:305.4: Yo tu evaṃ samādiyati pāṇātipātassa pāpako vipākoti, diṭṭhe yeva dhamme abhisamparāye ca evaṃ sabbassa akusalassa hetuto ārati.
pe8:306.1: Parivattanāti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti adadato puññaṃ na pavaḍḍhati.
pe8:306.2: Yaṃ dānamayaṃ, taṃ saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati, asaṃyamato veraṃ karīyati.
pe8:306.3: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ akusalo na jahāti.
pe8:306.4: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sanibbutoti dūtaṃ pesetvā paṇītaṃ pesetvāpi na pakkosāmi, so sayameva pana mahābhikkhusaṃghaparivāro amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampatto amhehi ca santhāgārasālā kāritā, ettha mayaṃ dasabalaṃ ānetvā maṅgalaṃ bhaṇāpemāti cintetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
pe8:306.5: Yena santhāgāraṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti taṃ divasaṃ kira santhāgāre cittakammaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā aṭṭakā muttamattā honti.
pe8:306.6: Buddhā nāma araññajjhāsayā araññārāmā antogāme vaseyyuṃ vā no vāti tasmā bhagavato manaṃ jānitvāva paṭijaggissāmāti cintetvā te bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
pe8:306.7: Idāni pana manaṃ labhitvā paṭijaggitukāmā yena santhāgāraṃ, tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pe8:306.8: Sabbasantharinti yathā sabbaṃ santhataṃ hoti evaṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti.
pe8:306.9: Ettha pana te mallarājāno santhāgāraṃ paṭijaggitvā nagaravīthiyopi sammajjāpetvā dhaje ussāpetvā suvaṇṇaghaṭikadaliyo ca ṭhapāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ dīpamālāhi vippakiṇṇatārakaṃ viya katvā khīrapake dārake khīraṃ pāyetha, dahare kumāre lahuṃ lahuṃ bhojāpetvā sayāpetha, uccāsaddaṃ mākari, ajja ekarattiṃ satthā antogāmeva vasissati, buddhā nāma appasaddakāmā hontīti bheriṃ carāpetvā sayaṃ daṇḍakadīpikā ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu.
pe8:306.10: Bhagavantaṃyeva purakkhatvāti bhagavantaṃ purato katvā, tattha bhagavā bhikkhūnañceva upāsakānañca majjhe nisinno ativiya virocati.
pe8:306.11: Samantapāsādiko suvaṇṇavaṇṇo abhirūpo dassanīyo puratthimakāyato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rasmi uṭṭhahitvā gaganatale asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti.
pe8:306.12: Pacchimakāyato dakkhiṇahatthato vāmahatthato suvaṇṇavaṇṇā heṭṭhā pādatalehi pavāḷavaṇṇarasmi uṭṭhahitvā ghanapathaviyaṃ asītihatthaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti, evaṃ samantā asītihatthamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vijjotamānā vitaṇḍamānā vidhāvanti, sabbe disābhāgā suvaṇṇacampakapupphehi vikiriyamānā viya suvaṇṇaghaṭato nikkhantasuvaṇṇarasadhārāhi siñcamānā viya pasāritasuvaṇṇapaṭaparikkhittā viya verambhavātasamuṭṭhitakiṃsukakiṃsukārakaṇikārapupphacuṇṇasamokiṇṇā viya vippakasantaṃ asītianubyañjanabyāmappabhā dvattiṃsavaralakkhaṇasamujjalaṃ sarīraṃ samuggatatārakaṃ viya gaganatalaṃ vikasitamiva padumavanaṃ sabbaphāliphullo viya yojanasatiko pāricchattako paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitānaṃ dvattiṃsacandānaṃ dvattiṃsasūriyānaṃ dvattiṃsacakkavattīnaṃ dvattiṃsadevarājānaṃ dvattiṃsamahābrahmānaṃ nibbuto asekkhassa natthi nibbuti. (9)
pe8:307.1: Vevacananti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, anumodatopi puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
pe8:308.1: Paññattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, alobhassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṃ.
pe8:308.2: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti adosassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṃ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amohassa paṭinissayaghātapaññattiyā paññattaṃ. (11)
pe8:309.1: Otaraṇoti pañcasu indriyesu dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati saṃyamena sīlakkhandho.
pe8:309.2: Otiṇṇo chasu indriyesu saṃvaro, ayaṃ samādhikkhandho, yaṃ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, ayaṃ paññākkhandho, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho.
pe8:310.1: Sodhanoti yenārambhena idaṃ suttaṃ desitaṃ so ārambho suddho. (13)
pe8:311.2: Cāgo pariccāgo dhammadānaṃ āmisadānaṃ, aṭṭha dānāni vitthārena kātabbāni, ayaṃ vemattatā.
pe8:312.1: Parikkhāroti dānassa pāmojjaṃ paccayo, alobho hetu.
pe8:312.2: Saṃyamato yoniso manasikāro hetu, pariccāgo paccayo.
pe8:312.3: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti yathābhūtadassanaṃ paccayo, ñāṇappaṭilābho hetu.
pe8:312.4: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti parato ca ghoso ajjhattañca yoniso manasikāro maggo ca hetu ca paccayo ca. (15)
pe8:313.1: Samāropanoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti gāthā tassa sīlampi vaḍḍhati.
pe8:313.4: Aññepi kilesā na cīyanti yepissa tappaccayā uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātā, tepissa na uppajjanti.
pe8:313.5: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgadosassāpi khayā rāgānusayassapi khayā dosassa mohassāpi sa nibbutoti sopādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesāpi.
pe8:313.7: Therassa mahākaccāyanassa peṭakopadese hārassa sampātabhūmi samattā.
